originContent: > **2025.06.24** - We are excited to release **DreamO v1.1** with significant improvements in image quality, reduced likelihood of body composition errors, and enhanced aesthetics. [Learn more about this model](https://github.com/bytedance/DreamO/blob/main/dreamo_v1.1.md)
translatedContent: > **2025.06.24** - We are excited to release **DreamO v1.1** with significant improvements in image quality, reduced likelihood of body composition errors, and enhanced aesthetics. [Learn more about this model](https://github.com/bytedance/DreamO/blob/main/dreamo_v1.1.md)

originContent: This implementation is based on the 2025.5.19 version of ComfyUI (commit ID: e930a38). Compatibility issues may occur if you're using an older version.
translatedContent: This implementation is based on the 2025.5.19 version of ComfyUI (commit ID: e930a38). Compatibility issues may occur if you're using an older version.

originContent: # Please make sure that you have installed the forked version of facexlib, not the original facexlib. Otherwise, you may encounter face parsing errors.
translatedContent: # Please make sure that you have installed the forked version of facexlib, not the original facexlib. Otherwise, you may encounter face parsing errors.
If your machine already has FLUX models downloaded, you can skip this.

originContent: If your machine already has FLUX models downloaded, you can skip this.

translatedContent: - Download all files ending with `.safetensors` in https://huggingface.co/ByteDance/DreamO/tree/main/comfyui => `ComfyUI/models/loras`.

originContent: - Download all files ending with `.safetensors` in https://huggingface.co/ByteDance/DreamO/tree/main/comfyui => `ComfyUI/models/loras`.
translatedContent: - ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥**v1.1**: Download all files ending with `.safetensors` in https://huggingface.co/ByteDance/DreamO/tree/main/v1.1 => `ComfyUI/models/loras`.

originContent: - ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥**v1.1**: Download all files ending with `.safetensors` in https://huggingface.co/ByteDance/DreamO/tree/main/v1.1 => `ComfyUI/models/loras`.

translatedContent: Please find the workflows in [workflows](workflows) folder, [this v1.1 workflow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ToTheBeginning/ComfyUI-DreamO/main/workflows/dreamo_comfyui_v1.1.json) is the latest version.

originContent: Please fine the workflows in [workflows](workflows) folder, [this v1.1 workflow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ToTheBeginning/ComfyUI-DreamO/main/workflows/dreamo_comfyui_v1.1.json) is the latest version.

translatedContent: The v1.1 model, when combined with the [Super-Realism LoRA](https://huggingface.co/strangerzonehf/Flux-Super-Realism-LoRA), can further enhance realism. However, since it's a realism-focused LoRA, it may affect style transfer. Use it as needed.

originContent: The v1.1 model, when combined with the [Super-Realism LoRA](https://huggingface.co/strangerzonehf/Flux-Super-Realism-LoRA), can further enhance realism. However, since it's a realism-focused LoRA, it may affect style transfer. Use it as needed.

translatedContent: - This node loads two image preprocessing models: the BEN2 model for background removal and the facexlib model for aligned face detection.

originContent: - This node loads two image preprocessing models: the BEN2 model for background removal and the facexlib model for aligned face detection.

translatedContent: - This node encodes the reference image into a latent representation based on the selected task type. Three task types are available: ip, id, and style.

originContent: - This node encodes the reference image into a latent representation based on the selected task type. Three task types are available: ip, id, and style.
translatedContent: - ip: will remove the background of the reference image

originContent: - ip: will remove the backgound of the reference image
translatedContent: - id: will align & crop the face from the reference image, similar to PuLID

originContent: - id: will align&crop the face from the reference image, similar to PuLID
translatedContent: - style: will keep the background of the reference image. You still need to trigger meta prompt to activate the style transfer task

originContent: - style: will keep the backgound of the reference image. you still need trigger meta prompt to activate the style transfer task

translatedContent: - This node adds a hook to the Flux model to support concatenating the reference latent with the noisy latent.

originContent: - This node adds a hook to the Flux model to support concatenating the reference latent with the noisy latent.

translatedContent: - The current code does not implement the logic for true CFG, which means you need to set cfg=1 in the sampler node

originContent: - The current code does not implement the logic for true CFG, which means you need to set cfg=1 in the sampler node
translatedContent: - As mentioned earlier, we're new to ComfyUI. If you have better workflows or suggestions, please let us know.

originContent: - As mentioned earlier, we're new to ComfyUI. If you have better workflows or suggestions, please let us know.

translatedContent: The implementation of the ComfyUI plugin refers to [ComfyUI_PuLID_Flux_ll](https://github.com/lldacing/ComfyUI_PuLID_Flux_ll).

originContent: The implementation of the ComfyUI plugin refers to [ComfyUI_PuLID_Flux_ll](https://github.com/lldacing/ComfyUI_PuLID_Flux_ll).
